Name: Lavender Twigs WL
Description: Delicate fragrant flower with many useful properties.

DescriptionLocalization.pt: Flor perfumada delicada com muitas propriedades úteis.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Нежное душистое растение, обладающее множеством полезных свойств.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 精致的香花，有许多有用的特性。
